item.title: 特朗普称不会试图撤换美联储主席鲍威尔
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在周日播出的一次访谈中表示，他不会试图在 1 月份上任后撤换美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Sunday he will not try to replace Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell upon taking office in January.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 将在越南建设第二家生产厂
item.description: 越南电动汽车（EV）制造商 VinFast 周日宣布了一项计划，将在国内建设第二家生产厂，届时其产能将翻一番，并表示有必要满足对其中小型车型日益增长的需求。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer VinFast on Sunday announced a plan to build its second domestic production plant that will double its output capacity, saying it is needed to meet increased demand for its small and mid-sized models.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服总裁韩志国将于 3 月出任 CEO，井贤栋留任董事长
item.description: 在金融科技公司最大的一次组织变革中，Han 于今年 3 月出任总裁。【原文：Han became president in March during the fintech's biggest organisational change.】

item.title: 美国众议院将投票决定提供 30 亿美元拆除中国电信设备
item.description: 美国众议院将于下周就年度国防法案进行投票，其中包括向美国电信公司提供略高于 30 亿美元的资金，用于从美国无线网络中移除中国电信公司华为和中兴制造的设备，以应对安全风险。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives is set to vote next week on an annual defense bill that includes just over $3 billion for U.S. telecom companies to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨：关闭大众工厂 "不是正确的做法
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）说，关闭工厂将是大众汽车的错误行为，并补充说这家欧洲最大的汽车制造商对其员工负有责任。【原文：Factory shutdowns would be a wrong move by Volkswagen , German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said, adding that Europe's largest carmaker had a responsibility to its employees.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行称准备与法国农业信贷银行就 BPM 银行问题坐下来谈
item.description: 意大利农业信贷银行发言人在 LinkedIn 上发帖称，意大利联合信贷银行已准备好与法国农业信贷银行坐下来谈，此前法国农业信贷银行增持了联合信贷银行收购目标 Banco BPM 的潜在股份。【原文：UniCredit is ready to sit down with Credit Agricole , a spokesperson for the Italian bank said in a LinkedIn post after the French lender increased its potential stake in Unicredit's takeover target Banco BPM .】

item.title: Axios 称，美国批准根据微软协议向阿联酋出口先进的人工智能芯片
item.description: 据《Axios》周六援引两位熟悉该交易的人士的话报道，美国政府已批准向微软在阿拉伯联合酋长国运营的一家工厂出口先进的人工智能芯片，这是该公司与阿联酋人工智能公司 G42 高度谨慎的合作关系的一部分。【原文：The U.S. government has approved the export of advanced artificial intelligence chips to a Microsoft-operated facility in the United Arab Emirates as part of the company's highly-scrutinized partnership with Emirati AI firm G42, Axios reported on Saturday, citing two people familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 独家：消息称意大利非正式支持法国农业信贷银行增持 BPM 股份
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，法国农业信贷银行周五表示将增持 Banco BPM 股份之前，已得到意大利政府的非正式支持。【原文：France's Credit Agricole had informal backing from the Italian government before it said on Friday it was raising its stake in Banco BPM , two sources close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 TikTok 内容创作者警告追随者在 Instagram 和 YouTube 上找到他们
item.description: TikTok 上的美国内容创作者要求粉丝们订阅他们在 Meta 旗下 Instagram 和 Alphabet 旗下 YouTube 等竞争对手平台上的频道，因为联邦上诉法院裁定，如果不在 1 月 19 日前将该社交媒体应用程序出售给一家美国公司，该应用程序就可能被禁用。【原文：American content creators on TikTok asked followers to subscribe to their channels on rival platforms like Meta-owned Instagram and Alphabet's YouTube after a federal appeals court ruled that the social media app could be banned if it is not sold to a U.S.-based company by Jan. 19.】

item.title: 数据显示，在 TikTok 面临禁令威胁之际，美国在 TikTok Shop 上的消费有所增长
item.description: 根据TikTok的估计和路透社对Facteus数据测试出的消费模式的分析，到目前为止，美国TikTok用户在这个假日购物季花费巨资购买了电子商务平台TikTok Shop上一系列供应商的商品。【原文：U.S. TikTok users spent heavily to buy merchandise from a range of vendors on the e-commerce platform TikTok Shop so far this holiday shopping season, according to TikTok estimates and a Reuters analysis of spending patterns measured by data from Facteus.】

item.title: CFM 获得 LEAP-1A 发动机耐久性修复的监管认证
item.description: 喷气发动机制造商 CFM 国际公司周五表示，美国和欧洲的航空监管机构已经为其 LEAP-1A 发动机认证了一种 "更耐用 "的高压涡轮组件，该发动机为空中客车公司的窄体喷气机提供动力。【原文：Jet engine maker CFM International said on Friday aviation regulators in the United States and Europe have certified a "more durable" high-pressure turbine kit for its LEAP-1A engines that power the narrowbody jets of Airbus .】

item.title: 美国法官不会取消信用卡逾期费上限为 8 美元的规定
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一名联邦法官周五驳回了消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）提出的取消一项命令的请求，该命令阻止了一项将信用卡滞纳金上限定为 8 美元的新规定，这项政策受到了商业和银行业团体的质疑。【原文：A federal judge in Texas on Friday rejected a request by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to lift an order that blocked a new rule capping credit card late fees at $8, a policy challenged by business and banking groups.】

item.title: 波音公司首席说客离职--首席执行官
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官周五在一封电子邮件中告诉员工，波音公司的政府事务主管兼高级说客将立即离职。【原文：Boeing's head of government affairs and top lobbyist is leaving effective immediately, the planemaker's CEO told employees in an email Friday.】

item.title: 谷歌起诉 CFPB
item.description: 互联网巨头谷歌（Google）周五表示，它正在起诉美国消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau），原因是该机构决定下令联邦政府对谷歌支付（Google Pay）进行监管。【原文：Internet giant Google said Friday it was suing the US Consumer Financial Protection Bureau over the agency's decision to order federal supervision of Google Pay, the company's payment arm.】

item.title: 超微电脑公司延期提交延迟的年度报告
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）周五表示，该公司已从纳斯达克获得延期至 2 月 25 日提交其延迟的年度报告和季度报告的许可，这使得这家人工智能服务器制造商的股价在延期交易中上涨了 5%。【原文：Super Micro Computer said on Friday it has received an extension from the Nasdaq till Feb. 25 to file its delayed annual and quarterly reports, sending the AI server maker's shares up 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 油田服务提供商福禄克申请在美国上市
item.description: 油田服务供应商福禄克控股公司（Flowco Holdings）周五表示，该公司已申请在美国首次公开发行股票，这是最近投资者对新上市股票兴趣回升的最新举措。【原文：Oilfield services provider Flowco Holdings said on Friday it has filed for a U.S. initial public offering, the latest to capitalize on the recent revival in investor appetite for newly listed stocks.】

item.title: 美国法院维持允许对土耳其 Halkbank 提起制裁诉讼的裁决
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周五拒绝重新考虑其允许联邦政府起诉土耳其哈尔克银行（Halkbank）的裁决，指控该银行帮助伊朗逃避美国制裁。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Friday declined to reconsider its ruling allowing the federal government to prosecute Turkey's Halkbank on charges it helped Iran evade American sanctions.】

item.title: Palantir 与 Anduril 就国防领域的人工智能培训签署合作协议
item.description: 数据分析公司帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies）和国防科技公司安杜里尔工业公司（Anduril Industries）周五表示，双方已合作将国防数据用于人工智能训练。【原文：Data analytics firm Palantir Technologies and defense tech company Anduril Industries have partnered to use defense data for artificial intelligence training, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局局长考虑简化飞机认证程序
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）局长正在努力简化飞机认证，并在一月份发生飞行中紧急情况后加强对波音公司的监督。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration is working to streamline aircraft certification and strengthen oversight of Boeing in the aftermath of an in-flight emergency in January.】

item.title: 南美农民对南方共同市场-欧盟协议表示欢迎，但对细枝末节持谨慎态度
item.description: 南美洲农业是全球粮食的重要来源，周五，该地区的南方共同市场集团和欧盟达成了一项自由贸易协定，南美洲的农业部门为此欢呼雀跃。【原文：South America's agricultural sector, a key source of global food, celebrated on Friday as the regional Mercosur bloc and the European Union struck a free trade agreement, though farmers said they wanted to see the small print of the deal.】

item.title: 美国监管机构将谷歌支付公司置于监管之下
item.description: 消费者金融保护局在一份声明中说，该监管机构周五发布了一项命令，确立了对谷歌支付公司的监管权。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau published an order on Friday establishing supervisory authority over Google Payment Corp., the regulatory agency said in a statement.】

item.title: Stellantis 将重新加入 ACEA 汽车制造商协会
item.description: Stellantis 周五表示，它计划重新加入欧洲汽车游说团体 ACEA（该团体已于 2023 年初退出），此举可能标志着该汽车制造商对其电气化计划采取了更加谨慎的立场。【原文：Stellantis on Friday said it planned to rejoin European auto lobby ACEA, which it had left at the beginning of 2023, in a move that might flag a more cautious stance for the automaker on its electrification plans.】

item.title: 美国法官称西南航空必须面对关于西语裔学生免费航班的偏见指控
item.description: 一名美国法官周五表示，西南航空公司必须面对一名著名的平权法案反对者提起的诉讼，该反对者声称，一项现已停止的向西班牙裔大学生提供免费航班的计划存在种族歧视。【原文：A U.S. judge on Friday said Southwest Airlines must face a lawsuit by a prominent affirmative action opponent claiming a now-defunct program that awarded free flights to Hispanic college students was racially discriminatory.】

item.title: 安联集团前雇员因 70 亿美元基金倒闭免于牢狱之灾
item.description: 周五，安联集团一名前基金经理因在 COVID-19 大流行病引发的私人投资基金崩溃中的作用而免于入狱，据估计该事件造成了 70 亿美元的投资者损失。【原文：A former Allianz fund manager was spared prison time on Friday over his role in a meltdown of private investment funds sparked by the COVID-19 pandemic that caused an estimated $7 billion of investor losses.】

item.title: 雪佛龙首席执行官称未与当选总统特朗普讨论委内瑞拉问题
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron）首席执行官迈克尔-沃思（Michael Wirth）周五表示，雪佛龙公司是目前在委内瑞拉油田作业的唯一一家美国石油生产商，该公司尚未与当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的团队就该公司在委内瑞拉的业务进行任何讨论。【原文：Chevron , the only U.S. oil producer now working in Venezuela's oilfields, has not held any discussions with President-elect Donald Trump's team over the company's operations in the country, CEO Michael Wirth said on Friday.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Elektra 公司股票重拾升势，收复了此前的部分损失
item.description: 周五，墨西哥零售商埃莱克特拉集团（Grupo Elektra）的股价上涨了近 20%，抹去了本周累积的部分损失。【原文：Shares in Mexican retailer Grupo Elektra rose by nearly 20% on Friday, erasing a part of the losses it has accumulated during the week.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 高管遇害后，医疗保险公司股价下跌
item.description: 周五，包括联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）在内的医疗保险公司股价继续下跌，两天前该公司医疗保险部门首席执行官布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）在曼哈顿一家酒店外被一名埋伏的枪手开枪射杀。【原文：Shares of health insurance companies including UnitedHealth Group continued to fall on Friday, two days after Brian Thompson, the CEO of the company's health insurance unit, was fatally shot outside a Manhattan hotel by a gunman lying in wait.】

item.title: 美国为什么要禁止 TikTok？对它的指控
item.description: 美国联邦上诉法院裁定支持一项法律，要求中国字节跳动公司在明年初之前剥离其在美国的流行短视频应用 TikTok，否则将面临禁令。【原文：A U.S. federal appeals court ruled in favor of upholding a law requiring Chinese-based ByteDance to divest its popular short video app TikTok in the United States by early next year or face a ban.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 通胀报告对股市反弹构成考验，美联储会议迫在眉睫
item.description: 下周的通胀报告将考验美股创纪录涨势的力度，并提供可能影响美联储降息计划的重要数据。【原文：An inflation report in the coming week will test the strength of the record-setting U.S. stocks rally and provide a crucial piece of data that could factor into the Federal Reserve's plans for rate cuts.】

item.title: 消息人士称，高盛正在探索客户用于推出 ETF 的平台选择
item.description: 一位熟知内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，高盛正在为其旨在帮助该行机构客户推出自己的交易所交易基金的 ETF Accelerator 平台探索各种选择，包括可能的出售。【原文：Goldman Sachs is exploring options, including a potential sale, for its ETF Accelerator platform designed to help the bank's institutional clients launch their own exchange-traded funds, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday.】
